text: Lucas Mensa (born 24 May 1996) is an Argentine rugby union centre. He made his debut for the international team on 17 August 2019 against in Pretoria, South Africa. On 19 August 2019 Mensa was named in Argentina's squad for the 2019 Rugby World Cup. He is the only amateur player of the squad. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Rugby union centres Category:Argentine rugby union players Category:Argentina international rugby union players
title: Lucas Mensa
